name: The Apparition of the Virgin and Child to Saint Louis of France
description: The Apparition of the Virgin and Child to Saint Louis of France; Mariano Salvador Maella (Spanish, 1739 - 1819); about 1780s; Pen and brown ink and brown wash over black chalk; squared in black chalk; 21 x 14.4 cm (8 1/4 x 5 11/16 in.); 94.GA.99; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Apparition of the Virgin and Child to Saint Louis of France
medium: Pen and brown ink and brown wash over black chalk; squared in black chalk
